column3: School of Health and Psychological Sciences
column5: Key informationYou will combine the latest research and theory with your own professional experience on this master’s programme for practising radiographers. You will learn with expert practitioners and researchers who are leaders in their fields and contribute to knowledge that will improve the understanding and practice of radiography.Course overviewYou will combine the latest research and theory with your own professional experience on this master’s programme for practising radiographers. You will learn with expert practitioners and researchers who are leaders in their fields and contribute to knowledge that will improve the understanding and practice of radiography.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year part time (PGCert), 2 years part time (PGDip), 3 years part time (MSc)
